HashFunction.description: Algorithm used for generation the hash (see node.js crypto package).

context.description: The context directory for creating names.

hashDigest.description: The encoding to use when generating the hash, defaults to 'base64'. All encodings from Node.JS' hash.digest are supported.

hashDigestLength.description: The prefix length of the hash digest to use, defaults to 4.

hashFunction.description: The hashing algorithm to use, defaults to 'md4'. All functions from Node.JS' crypto.createHash are supported.
